InvoiceAddressGroup.name: InvoiceAddressGroup
InvoiceAddressGroup.description: Represents the storage of the buyer's address information.

Address.description: The buyer's address. See Compound Field Considerations and Limitations for details on geolocation compound fields.

InvoiceAddressGroupNumber.description: Required. The auto-generated reference number for the invoice address group.

InvoiceId.description: Required. The ID of the invoice associated with the address group.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The accuracy rating for the geocode of the address group. The accuracy rating contains information about the location of a latitude and longitude.

PostalCode.description: The buyer's postal code or ZIP code.
